alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 06 at 3:03PM PST until January 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 9 inches possible below 2500 feet. Above 2500 feet, total snow accumulations between 12 and 22 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Conconully, Winthrop, Mazama, Leavenworth, Twisp, Methow, Loup Loup Pass, and Plain. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...The strong winds and weight of snow on tree limbs may down power lines and could cause sporadic power outages. Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
